OSM for Malaria Eradication in Botswana

By Peace Corps March 01, 2015 Comment Tweet Like +1

BOSTWANA CASE STUDY

A brief case study written by Peace Corpsâ€™ Mike Banfield and Theresa Govert, currently stationed in Botswana. The Peace Corps worked with volunteers from the local health clinic to use GPS devices, OSM and QGIS to analyze the effectiveness of a malaria prevention campaign.

This is a model case for how Peace Corps volunteers and their communities can take advantage of GIS tools to make data-driven project decisions.
